TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataRowView extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor, class System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo, class System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject, class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public Class DataRowView Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor, IDataErrorInfo, IEditableObject, INotifyPropertyChanged

public ref class DataRowView : System::ComponentModel::ICustomTypeDescriptor, System::ComponentModel::IDataErrorInfo, System::ComponentModel::IEditableObject, System::ComponentModel::INotifyPropertyChanged
type DataRowView = class interface ICustomTypeDescriptor interface IEditableObject interface IDataErrorInfo interface INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 表示 的自訂檢視。

span.span: Represents a customized view of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每當資料會顯示，例如可以顯示控制項，只有一個版本的每個資料列。Whenever data is displayed, such as in a control, only one version of each row can be displayed. 顯示的資料列是。The displayed row is a . A可以有四個不同的版本狀態之一： `Default`， `Original`， `Current`，和`Proposed`。A can have one of four different version states: `Default`, `Original`, `Current`, and `Proposed`. 叫用後上，任何已編輯的值會成為`Proposed`值。After invoking on a , any edited value becomes the `Proposed` value. 直到或是叫用，資料列有`Original`和`Proposed`版本。Until either or is invoked, the row has an `Original` and a `Proposed` version. 如果是叫用，建議的版本會捨棄，而且此值會還原至`Original`。If is invoked, the proposed version is discarded, and the value reverts to `Original`. 如果叫用時，不再具有`Proposed`版本; 相反地，建議的值會變成目前的值。If is invoked, the no longer has a `Proposed` version; instead, the proposed value becomes the current value. 預設值為僅適用於具有定義的預設值的資料行的資料列。Default values are available only on rows that have columns with default values defined. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來判斷資料列中的狀態。The following example uses the property to determine the state of a row in the . (請參閱的另一個範例使用。)(See for another example using .) [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此類型是安全多執行緒的讀取作業。

span.span: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 您必須同步處理任何寫入作業。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

summary.span: 開始編輯程序。

span.span: Begins an edit procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用新增。Use to add a . 方法等同於方法。The method is identical to the method of the . 在呼叫，所做的變更可以回復藉由呼叫。After calling , any changes made to the can be rolled back by calling . 呼叫方法，再允許使用者變更資料列的值。Call the method before allowing users to change row values. 值已變更之後，就會擷取新的值設定至`DataRowVersion.Proposed`。After values have been changed, you retrieve the new values by setting the to `DataRowVersion.Proposed`. 檢查此值與商務規則，並回復的變更，如果需要透過呼叫，或呼叫接受變更。Check the values with a business rule, and roll back the changes if needed by calling , or call to accept the changes. ## Examples 下列範例會編輯中的資料列。The following example edits a row in a . 呼叫之前，和之後。calling the before, and afterwards. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRowView.BeginEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowView.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowView.BeginEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowView.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消編輯程序。

span.span: Cancels an edit procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呼叫，資料列的所有變更都會都復原。After calling , all changes to the row are rolled back. 您可以也回復變更藉由呼叫父代上。You can also roll back changes by calling on the parent . ## Examples 下列範例會編輯中的資料列。The following example edits a row in a . 呼叫方法來驗證失敗時取消變更。The method is called to cancel the changes if the validation fails. remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料列不會永久刪除直到上叫用所屬資料列。The row is not permanently deleted until is invoked on the that the row belongs to. > [!NOTE] > A可能不正確時`DataRow`基礎資料表中刪除了。A may be invalid when a `DataRow` is deleted from the underlying table. 當就變成無效，存取與相關聯的值的作業， ，例如，擲回例外狀況。When the becomes invalid, operations that access values associated with , such as , throw an exception. ## Examples 下列範例會使用的資料列上的方法。The following example uses the method on a row.
